action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image is a pixel art representation of a word. It is composed of square tiles in various colors, including green, purple, and orange. The word appears to be "HAPPY" with the letters arranged in a somewhat abstract manner. The letters are not in a standard font, but rather a more playful, blocky style.

The shapes are arranged in a somewhat random pattern, with no clear connection between them. The image has a retro, pixel art aesthetic.
